comment: Christianity spread because of the power of the words of Jesus. Internationally followed when Paul was still officially slaughtering all the followers of Jesus, men, women, saints, you name it. Nothing to do with Paul. Yes, Constantine making it the official Roman religion cemented it, but the reason he did is because of it's rising popularity despite the persecutions. And the "European" religions were pig ignorant Pagan horseshit.
